resources.string: Click here to take the Belbin test and finish setting your account up!

string.name: signup_link_text
string.u: DON\'T HAVE AN ACCOUNT? SIGN UP

resources.string: To complete each section of the test, apportion 10 points between those sentences that apply to you: one of which you feel sums you up well while the other only applies some of the time. You may only grant points to up to 3 sentences.\n\nFor example, you may assign 7 points to the first choice, and 2 points to another choice, and 1 point to the last choice.
Your class has been created with the following entry code:

You are a Coordinator!

Characteristics:
Calm, self-confident, and controlled.

The distinguishing feature of Coordinators is their ability to cause others to work to shared goals. Mature, trusting and confident, they delegate readily. While Coordinators are not necessarily the cleverest members of a team, they have a broad and worldly outlook and generally command respect.

Function:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:
Secondary role: Implementer
